title: Additional FSI shall be permissible subject to payment of25 % premium as per ASR of the land (For FSI 1) of the year in which such FSI is granted for the BUA and shall be equally shared between GoM & MCGM
clause_text: Additional FSI shall be permissible subject to payment of25 % premium as per ASR of the land (For FSI 1) of the year in which such FSI is granted for the BUA and shall be equally shared between GoM & MCGM.
